name: PowerSuit Modules
description:
A plethora of modules compatible with Nogs' PowerSuit Mod. 
 Check out the mod page: https://ficsit.app/mod/BezrE8aswqXLRX 
 This mod would be impossible without Nog's open source and easily extensible PowerSuit mod. Be sure to check it out, and consider writing a modules mod of your own. 
 Turtle and rabbit icons from Freepik on flaticon.com
